name: CircularProgressIndicator
desc: A Material Design circular progress indicator, which spins to indicate that the application is busy.

fields.name: strokeWidth
fields.desc: The width of the line used to draw the circle.

fields.name: strokeAlign
fields.desc: The relative position of the stroke on a [CircularProgressIndicator].

fields.name: constraints
fields.desc: Defines minimum and maximum sizes for a [CircularProgressIndicator].

fields.name: trackGap
fields.desc: The gap between the active indicator and the background track.

fields.name: year2023
fields.desc: When true, the [CircularProgressIndicator] will use the 2023 Material Design 3 appearance.

fields.name: padding
fields.desc: The padding around the indicator track.
